summary: Archival footage and personal testimonials present an intimate portrait of the life and career of British singer/songwriter Amy Winehouse.
cast: Amy Winehouse|Lauren Gilbert|Juliette Ashby|Nick Shymansky|Tyler James|Guy Moot|Chris Taylor|Nick Gatfield|Ian Barter|Garry Mulholland|Jonathan Ross|Janis Collins|Mitch Winehouse|Sam Beste|Bobby Womack|Salaam Remi|Yasiin Bey|Tim Kash|Phil Meynell|Pete Doherty|Blake Fielder-Civil|Lucian Grainge|Raye Cosbert|Mark Ronson|Darcus Beese|Cynthia Winehouse|Russell Brand|Alex Clare|David Letterman|Jay Leno|Monte Lipman|Terry Richardson|Steve Kandell|Chip Somers|Alex Foden|Natalie Cole|Tony Bennett|Beyoncé|Foo Fighters|Rihanna|Jay-Z|Andrew Morris|Frankie Boyle|Graham Norton|Blake Wood|Shomari Dillon|Questlove|Reg Traviss|Cristina Romete|Dale Davis|Andrew Higgie|Dave Grohl|Vernon Kay|Alicia Keys|George Lopez|Sophie Raworth
title: Amy (la chica detrás del nombre)
